content: One traditional dessert from the Normandy region is Tarte aux Pommes, which is an apple tart made with crisp apples and a buttery, flaky pastry crust. Another popular dessert is Teurgoule, a sweet rice pudding made with milk, cinnamon, and sugar, often baked in a ceramic dish. Lastly, another traditional dessert is Calvados Soufflé, which is a light and airy soufflé made with the region's famous apple brandy, Calvados.
